actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-262.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 343 - 1 (Record Vote No: 295).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3603) to provide price and income protection for farmers, assure consumers an abundance of food and fiber at reasonable prices, continue food assistance to low-income households, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3603 (Agricultural price supports).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3603) to provide price and income protection for farmers, assure consumers an abundance of food and fiber at reasonable prices, continue food assistance to low-income households, and for other purposes.
